scripts.test:setup: dotenv -e .env.test -- pnpm prisma migrate deploy && dotenv -e .env.test -- ts-node prisma/seed.ts
scripts.test:e2e:auth: pnpm run test:setup && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json test/auth.e2e-spec.ts --coverage --collectCoverageFrom "src/auth/**/*.ts"
scripts.test:e2e:dishes: pnpm run test:setup && dotenv -e .env.test -- jest --config ./test/jest-e2e.json test/dishes.e2e-spec.ts --coverage --collectCoverageFrom "src/dishes/**/*.ts"
